researchers.post: What I fail to understand is: Why do people “fear” the authenticity of the Shroud so much. I know that the study of human behavior shows, with continuous denial, there is a sub-consciousness occurrence taking place. I surmise that the misinformation created by the media is strongly involved with creating this manifestation. As Barrie Schwortz stated in his presentation at St. John’s University, the media has misinformed all of us so that this story can continuously be sensationalized and produce profits. If the media reported the facts, this story would no longer be debated.
researchers.title: Jones:  The Turin Shroud is authentic. Get over it!
